description:
Kanta`s Heracross was first seen battling Ash`s Pikachu and Dawn`s Piplup in a tag battle. It didn`t last too long against them as it was easily overpowered by the combination.
After the battle between Arcues and the God Pokemon had ended and the Jewel of Life was returned, Heracross watched as Beautifly landed on a bridge that had just been rebuilt.
name: Heracros (Kanta)
